name: DevOps Champion session recordings.txt - Overall overview of Razorpay infra- AWS, K8s

name: DevOps Champion session recordings.txt - Kubernetes troubleshooting
description: This section provides links to video recordings and presentation slides related to two topics: 'FinOps-DevOps: know-how' and 'Kube-Manifest'. The recordings and slides cover knowledge sharing and troubleshooting related to Kubernetes, a popular open-source container orchestration system used in DevOps practices. The content seems to be aimed at individuals interested in learning about financial operations (FinOps) and DevOps methodologies, as well as those seeking guidance on working with Kubernetes manifests.
use_cases: Learning about FinOps and DevOps practices
Gaining knowledge on container orchestration with Kubernetes

name: DevOps Champion session recordings.txt - FinOps-DevOps : know-how
description: This section provides information about two recorded sessions from a DevOps Champion event. The first session covers topics related to FinOps and DevOps, including certificate monitoring, secrets management, and access management. The second session focuses on infrastructure changes and navigating them within the context of Vishnu, which seems to be a specific system or platform.
use_cases: Monitoring certificates and managing their lifecycle
Securing and managing access to sensitive information (secrets)
Managing and controlling access to resources and systems
Understanding and adapting to infrastructure changes in a specific system (Vishnu)

name: DevOps Champion session recordings.txt - Kube-Manifest
description: This section provides links to video recordings and presentation slides related to two topics: Strimzi Kafka and Monitoring. The recordings are from DevOps Champion sessions, likely internal training or knowledge-sharing sessions. The Strimzi Kafka recording covers the deployment and management of Apache Kafka using the Strimzi Kafka Operator on Kubernetes. The Monitoring recording discusses monitoring practices and tools for Kubernetes environments.
use_cases: Learning about Strimzi Kafka Operator for deploying and managing Apache Kafka on Kubernetes
Understanding monitoring practices and tools for Kubernetes environments
Internal training or knowledge-sharing sessions for DevOps teams
Referencing recorded sessions and presentation materials for self-paced learning
